properties.description: Lesen aller Dateien in den Ordner von 2024

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://storagedatalakewist.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake2file/2024/*/*',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
